item.title: Setting up hugo blog with github pages and namecheap
item.description: This is first post where we will how we can buy domain example.com from namecheap point example.com to www.example.com CNAME @ www.example.com point www to username.github.io CNAME www username.github.io Add multiple A records which points to github IPs A @ 185.199.108.153 A @ 185.199.109.153 A @ 185.199.110.153 A @ 185.199.111.153 On github side. create repository username.github.io goto that repo settings>pages Change folder to docs instead of root and hit save
